english.segment1: Theres a battle between good and evil. And its raging inside of me. Theres a struggle - its God and the devil. Its Love against the Enemy
english.segment2: Whoa no. Im not giving up now. Whoa
english.segment3: Lifes a fight of wrong and right. Thats tearing me apart. Oh but what the cross has done. Yeah the world will try to battle for my heart. But the war is already won
english.segment4: Theres a snake thats hiding in the garden. Theres a beautiful apple tree. There is trouble on the horizon. But Im claiming victory. Whoa. Im not giving in now. Whoa
english.segment5: Lifes a fight of wrong and right. Thats tearing me apart. Oh but what the cross has done. Yeah the world will try to battle for my heart. But the war is already won
english.segment6: Whoa. Im not giving up now. Whoa. Im not giving in
english.segment7: Lifes a fight of wrong and right. Thats tearing me apart. Oh but what the cross has done. Yeah the world will try to battle for my heart. But the war is already won
